Detailed Description

RealBase provides a base class for functions which take three parameters

The RealBase interface provides abstract members for the evaluation of the function values on a three-dimensional grid.

abstract member:

  • Vector &f (double, double);
member:
  • operator () (double t, double u, double);
Todo:
Vector &normal (double, double, double); - or in base class?
Author:
Helge Preuss <scout@hyperspace-travel.de>
